      • Minotaur

        public Minotaur(processing.core.PImage spriteImage,
                double speed,
                double atkSpeed,
                double HP,
                double range,
                double damage,
                int x,
                int y,
                int w,
                int h)
        Creates an Enemy
        Parameters:
        spriteImage - the image of the character
        speed - how fast the enemy moves
        atkSpeed - how fast the enemy attacks
        HP - how much damage a enemy can take before dying
        range - the distance a enemy can cover with their weapon
        damage - the amount of damage the enemy can do with their weapon
        x - the x position of the enemy
        y - the x position of the enemy
        w - how wide the enemy is
        h - how tall the enemy is
